pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Principal Component Analysis for Outlier Detection // Methods to detect genetic markers involved in biological adaptation. 'pcadapt' provides statistical tools for outlier detection based on Principal Component Analysis. Implements the method described in (Luu, 2016) DOI:10.1111/1755-0998.12592 and later revised in (Priv, 2020) DOI:10.1093/molbev/msaa053.
